mapper.select: SELECT o.*,p.pid as ppid,p.name as pname, p.phoneNum as pphoneNum, p.contact as ppcontact, u.uid as uuid, u.name as uname, u.phoneNum as uphoneNum, u.companyName as ucompanyName, c.cid as ccid,c.oid as coid, c.name as cname, c.contractNo, c.partyA, c.partyB, c.contractUrl, c.signTime, c.startTime, c.endTime, c.createTime, c.service, c.money, c.payment, c.paymentWay, c.paymentDesc, f.fid, f.content as fcontent, f.averageScore FROM psp_order o left join psp_provider p on o.pid = p.pid left join psp_user u on o.uid = u.uid left join psp_order_contract c on o.oid = c.oid left join psp_order_feedback f on o.oid = f.oid where o.oid = #{oid}

SELECT count(*) FROM psp_order p left join psp_sale_center s on p.sid = s.sid
s.pid = #{pid}
